name: Raisini
slogan: Creative Marketing Agency / Record Label/ Tech Company
description:
Raisini is an award winning full-service, diversified lifestyle agency, and home to five divisions:

Entertainment & Events Services,
Nightlife Consultancy,
Record Label Services,
Design Services,
Marketing Services.

Raisini offers unique services to brands and individuals under one roof, that leave lasting memories of their brand identity with their customers. A set of services that are interconnected and an integral part of success for every brand or individual.

From Entertainment & Event to Music Publishing, Design, Brand Consultancy, Marketing or Photography, we do it all under one roof at RAISINI.

We are proud to be one of the unique entertainment & nightlife specialists globally, entertaining individuals and businesses around the world.

Since its inception in 1999, Raisini is led by founder and industry veteran Leonidas Raisi, a visionary entrepreneur, music producer & philanthropist, the entertainment entity has consistently built its profile, joining the ranks of the elite

team.name: Leonidas Raisini
team.bioHtml: Founder @Raisini Records @Raisini • Worked at @Universal Music Group, @Virgin Megastore

team.name: Nathalia Santarelli
team.bioHtml:
Managing Director at Raisini
CMO at HAVN

team.title: Founder / CEO
team.name: Leonidas Raisi
team.bioHtml: Launched & developed 4 start-up companies in Music, Sports, Events and Marketing and currently working on my new startup, a Tech firm.

team.title: Chief Marketing Officer
team.name: Nathalia Santarelli
team.bioHtml:
Managing Director at Raisini
CMO at HAVN

team.title: UX/UI Designer
team.name: Javan Pang
team.bioHtml: Not afraid of failing and believe testing the extreme boundaries is what creates effective design solutions.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Business Development Manager** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 Super Heroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
*  Lead end-to-end deal processes: strategy, sourcing, analysis, negotiation, and implementation, with significant autonomy and support the same activities for complex deals
* Develop and manage necessary business relationships internally and externally at the project team level
* **Bring your analytical A-game:** building business models, performing analysis to understand trends, provide actionable insights, and track productivity and success of initiatives to ensure we’re driving toward the best possible outcome
* Drive initiatives across our business teams to grow strategic and long term opportunities with our various partners. This involves wearing many hats and jumping in to help your teammates when the needs arise.
* **Restaurant/Bar/Cafe/Hotel Sourcing:** Use networking skills and relationships to get the city's best restaurants/bars/cafe's/hotels interested in Havn.​ ​Help​ ​acquire​ ​buzzworthy​ ​partners,​ ​whose​ ​presence​ ​on​ ​the​ ​platform​ ​will​ ​accelerate​ ​growth.  
* **Negotiations and Deal Making:** ​Establish a strong working partnership grounded on sustainable economics for both​ ​parties. 
* **CRM Integration:** ​Manage communications with  partners through CRM (Salesforce.com)​ ​and​ ​engagement​ ​tools​ ​(Groove).  
* Stakeholder Management: ​Responsible for managing relations with both global and national chains under tight​ ​deadlines.  
* **Account Management:** Monitor account performance. Gather and present key data and suggest reactions to forecasts. 
* Map and target restaurants/bars/cafe's/ in a very methodical and organised fashion
* Communicate (physical visits, email, calls, social media) with restaurants to demonstrate Havn technology
* Increasing the value of current customers while attracting new ones.
* Attend restaurant and food conferences
* Attending conferences, meetings, and industry events.
* Developing quotes and proposals for clients.


**Requirements**
* Multiple-years’ experience in the Hospitality, Lifestyle Industry with contacts of Restaurants, Bars, Cafe's, Hotels in the UK, ideally from start-up stage
* Preferably someone who has worked in a similar industry and has a network of people within these industries.
* Be an independent self-starter. The role will require someone who can manage their own time and effectively plan their day to day activities and be strategic to complete tasks. 
* Personal working Laptop
* Exceptional communication skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong verbal communication and interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company
**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

* You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
* We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
* This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
* You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
* You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in Ibiza from time to time.
* After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

**You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

**Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**

jobs.title: Experience Market Manager
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Experience Market Manager** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 Super Heroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
Market Growth – building partnerships and managing a team of local ambassadors to scale Experiences supply, create awareness, and successfully grow the booking value of your assigned markets through supply growth and cross-functional work with other teams.

**Responsibilities**

* Identifying and forging partnerships in-market to help drive Experience supply growth
* Recruit, supervise and motivate a team of in-market ambassadors mandated to grow and onboard high-quality supply
* Research, source and generate leads to help bring high quality Experiences
* Weekly measurement of the markets supply / demand balance in order to identify and mitigate supply / demand gaps in each market
* Proactive outreach (calls, emails, in-person encounters) to potential partners that can help us scale supply in-market
* Continuous interaction and engagement with new Experience hosts to ensure they are actively engaged, motivated and driven to Champion the Havn mission
* Work with cross functional teams (Account management team, Product, Marketing, Public Relations) to ensure that we are growing our business in each of the markets you are focused on.
* Consistently maintain the Havn quality standards when receiving new experiences
* CRM Management (Hubspot, leads management, …)
* Data driven and the ability to run reports, read dashboards and analyse data and metrics (Key Performance Indicators) of your markets.


**Requirements**
* Multiple-years’ experience in the Hospitality, Lifestyle Industry with contacts of Restaurants, Bars, Cafe's, Hotels in the UK, ideally from start-up stage
* Previous relevant experience in running programs at scale at least one of the following areas: Business Development, Sales or Growth
* A strategic mind with previous experience in Business development and/or Project management
* Excellent time management and strong attention to detail
* A growth mindset. You think and act like an entrepreneur: you are scrappy and goal driven, you are able to work independently and are resourceful.
* Market/sector knowledge; You are in touch with the latest trends around travel, lifestyle and what people want from their leisure time
* Strong verbal communication and interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company
**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

* You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
* We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
* This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
* You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
* You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in Ibiza from time to time.
* After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

**You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

**Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**

jobs.title: Head of Software Development
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Head of Software Development** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 Super Heroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
 
The Head of Software Development (HoSD) is a leadership role accountable for the successful delivery of software and IT support infrastructure for the Havn. Managing a team of developers, the HoSD will work closely with the CEO, and other members of the Senior Leadership Management Team (SLMT) in order to deliver software and IT services that meet user needs. The HoSD will be accountable for the creation and delivery of the strategic, software and IT architecture vision and leadership and all aspects of the development of the software.

* Lead the engineering team to take the project to the next level,
* Ensure delivery consistent with Agile processes across the team 
* Develop and deliver a strategic technological vision and direction for the Havn; 
* Work effectively with Product Managers and Product Owners to ensure delivery against 
* agreed priorities
* Design, develop, test, deploy, support and evolve software (native / hybrid applications, API’s)
* Manage individual priorities, deadlines and deliverables
* Collaborate with QA & solution team on continuous integration and delivery as well as automated and manual testing to ensure good quality solutions are delivered to provide value to our customers 
* Participate in an agile delivery process, and as part of that help size stories and own, research and recommend new solutions
* Using various techniques and tools, deliver strategic technical solutions to match business requirements and product life cycle deliverables
* Focus on component reusability, data sharing and security while complying with Enterprise standards and processes
* Experiment with new tools and technologies ensuring our solutions stay relevant in a rapidly changing technology landscape while sharing gained knowledge across teams

**Requirements**
* Multiple years of mobile programming in React Native, flutter, hybrid apps and full-stack development
* Experience with Android SDK and iOS development
* DevOps CI/CD pipeline configuration including publishing applications to Google Play store, Apple app store or an enterprise app store
* RESTful APIs, Microservices, webservices, expert in SOA design and technical implementations
* A thorough understanding of Object Orientated Programming, MVC (and iOS application architecture for iOS mobile developer)
* Proven experience in PCF, Bluemix, TomCat, Liberty, Framework, Rest API, Java Hibernate, JPA, DevOps (Eclipse, Jenkins, Maven, UCD, Docker, MS visual studio), Junit
* Experience with test automation Junit, XCTest and XCUI, Selenium
* Hands on experience with relational databases (MS SQL Server) and exposure to no-SQL data stores: MongoDB, ElasticSearch as well as caching stores (Redis)
* Methodology: Agile, Iterative, TDD
* Demonstrated ability to make design/enhancement recommendations/decisions for multiple applications/technologies, mentor on standards and coding practices and debug very complex or urgent problems
* Ability to resolves integration issues to guarantee solution conformance to requirements and engineering limitations.
* Very strong organisational, planning and multi-tasking skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company
* 

**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**

---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com

You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

IMPORTANT NOTES:

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**

jobs.title: Hybrid Mobile Engineer
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Hybrid Mobile Engineer** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 SuperHeroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
 
* Design, develop, test, deploy, support and evolve software (native / hybrid applications, API’s)
* Manage individual priorities, deadlines and deliverables
* Collaborate with QA & solution team on continuous integration and delivery as well as automated and manual testing to ensure good quality solutions are delivered to provide value to our customers 
* Participate in an agile delivery process, and as part of that help size stories and own, research and recommend new solutions
* Using various techniques and tools, deliver strategic technical solutions to match business requirements and product life cycle deliverables
* Focus on component reusability, data sharing and security while complying with Enterprise standards and processes
* Experiment with new tools and technologies ensuring our solutions stay relevant in a rapidly changing technology landscape while sharing gained knowledge across teams

**Requirements**
* Multiple years of mobile programming in React Native, flutter, hybrid apps and full-stack development
* Experience with Android SDK and iOS development
* DevOps CI/CD pipeline configuration including publishing applications to Google Play store, Apple app store or an enterprise app store
* RESTful APIs, Microservices, webservices, expert in SOA design and technical implementations
* A thorough understanding of Object Orientated Programming, MVC (and iOS application architecture for iOS mobile developer)
* Proven experience in PCF, Bluemix, TomCat, Liberty, Framework, Rest API, Java Hibernate, JPA, DevOps (Eclipse, Jenkins, Maven, UCD, Docker, MS visual studio), Junit
* Experience with test automation Junit, XCTest and XCUI, Selenium
* Hands on experience with relational databases (MS SQL Server) and exposure to no-SQL data stores: MongoDB, ElasticSearch as well as caching stores (Redis)
* Methodology: Agile, Iterative, TDD
* Demonstrated ability to make design/enhancement recommendations/decisions for multiple applications/technologies, mentor on standards and coding practices and debug very complex or urgent problems
* Ability to resolves integration issues to guarantee solution conformance to requirements and engineering limitations.
* Very strong organisational, planning and multi-tasking skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company

**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

**You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.
**
Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**
jobs.descriptionHtml:
RAISINI, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious Hybrid Mobile Engineer to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 SuperHeroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

What Does Success Look Like In This Role:

  • Design, develop, test, deploy, support and evolve software (native / hybrid applications, API’s)
  • Manage individual priorities, deadlines and deliverables
  • Collaborate with QA & solution team on continuous integration and delivery as well as automated and manual testing to ensure good quality solutions are delivered to provide value to our customers
  • Participate in an agile delivery process, and as part of that help size stories and own, research and recommend new solutions
  • Using various techniques and tools, deliver strategic technical solutions to match business requirements and product life cycle deliverables
  • Focus on component reusability, data sharing and security while complying with Enterprise standards and processes
  • Experiment with new tools and technologies ensuring our solutions stay relevant in a rapidly changing technology landscape while sharing gained knowledge across teams

Requirements

  • Multiple years of mobile programming in React Native, flutter, hybrid apps and full-stack development
  • Experience with Android SDK and iOS development
  • DevOps CI/CD pipeline configuration including publishing applications to Google Play store, Apple app store or an enterprise app store
  • RESTful APIs, Microservices, webservices, expert in SOA design and technical implementations
  • A thorough understanding of Object Orientated Programming, MVC (and iOS application architecture for iOS mobile developer)
  • Proven experience in PCF, Bluemix, TomCat, Liberty, Framework, Rest API, Java Hibernate, JPA, DevOps (Eclipse, Jenkins, Maven, UCD, Docker, MS visual studio), Junit
  • Experience with test automation Junit, XCTest and XCUI, Selenium
  • Hands on experience with relational databases (MS SQL Server) and exposure to no-SQL data stores: MongoDB, ElasticSearch as well as caching stores (Redis)
  • Methodology: Agile, Iterative, TDD
  • Demonstrated ability to make design/enhancement recommendations/decisions for multiple applications/technologies, mentor on standards and coding practices and debug very complex or urgent problems
  • Ability to resolves integration issues to guarantee solution conformance to requirements and engineering limitations.
  • Very strong organisational, planning and multi-tasking skills
  • Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
  • Judgment and decision-making ability
  • Initiative
  • Professionalism and confidentiality
  • Attention to detail and accuracy
  • Flexibility
  • Strong interpersonal skills
  • Passion for Havn and the mission of the company

---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------

You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

IMPORTANT NOTES:

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.
**
Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.

jobs.title: PR & Communications Manager
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **PR & Communications Manager** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 Super Heroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
 
* Build and execute the core UK PR strategy, balancing always on with bigger brand campaigns
* Build, lead and execute a communications launch plan across UK and later across Global markets
* Lead a successful and organised press office
* Create a buzz around the brand in print, online, and broadcast through proactive outbound press activity and influencer campaigns
* Research and identify brand-aligned influencers that reach each of our target audiences across new and existing markets
* Manage relationships with influencers in order to drive follower growth, engagement and customer acquisition
* Provide regular and detailed evaluation of media and influencer coverage and activity
* communicating with colleagues and key spokespeople
* liaising with, and answering enquiries from media, individuals and other organisations, often via telephone and email
* researching, writing and distributing press releases to targeted media
* collating and analysing media coverage
* writing and editing in-house magazines, case studies, speeches, articles and annual reports
* preparing and supervising the production of publicity brochures, handouts, direct mail leaflets, promotional videos, photographs, films and multimedia programmes
* devising and coordinating photo opportunities
* organising events including press conferences, exhibitions, open days and press tours
* maintaining and updating information on the organisation's website
* managing and updating information and engaging with users on social media sites such as Twitter and Facebook
* sourcing and managing speaking and sponsorship opportunities
* commissioning market research
* fostering community relations through events such as open days and through involvement in community initiatives
* managing the PR aspect of a potential crisis situation.


**Requirements**
* Multiple-years’ experience of leading PR activities in a tech-enabled hospitality /entertainment/B2C business, ideally from start-up stage
* Bachelor’s Degree
* Contacts and relationship with UK Media (Global media is a plus)
* Fluency in both English and native speaking in one additional language is required
* Previous relevant experience in a tech company
* A strategic mind with previous experience in PR/Communications
* Excellent time management and strong attention to detail
* A growth mindset. You think and act like an entrepreneur: you are scrappy and goal driven, you are able to work independently and are resourceful.
* Market/sector knowledge; You are in touch with the latest trends around travel, lifestyle and what people want from their leisure time
* Exceptional communication skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong verbal communication and interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company
**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

* You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
* We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
* This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
* You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
* You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in Ibiza from time to time.
* After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

**You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

**Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**

jobs.title: Product Manager - Mobile/Web
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Product Manager** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 SuperHeroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
 
* As a Product Manager you’ll work closely with members in the product management team, such as Product Managers, Product Owners, and Product Designers.
* As a Product Manager helps ensure that necessary steps are being taken across business functions (product, strategy, engineering team) to bring out the best results for the business.
* Collaborate  closely with Engineering, Design, UI/UX, Product Owners, Scrum Master, Agile Coach and Business Development, Marketing and Operations– to successfully develop, launch, and realize revenue goals for products.
* As a Product Manager will work within an agile software development team to track competitors’ and market tendencies; manage a product roadmap that involves marketing, customers and partners;
* Assist in Identifying and evaluating new market opportunities. Create business cases, level of effort estimates, and go-to-market strategies for chosen opportunities.
* Proactively defining and driving new horizontal technology partnerships and expands existing new solutions and customer use cases and scenarios.
* Developing deep understandings of internal and external customer segments and driving product and partnership strategy and providing direction that translate into high value features and customer wins.
* Managing dependencies and work with the Product Owner to identify and manage the backlog items;
* Align various stakeholders (marketing, operations, data analytics, etc.) on delivery scope (releases) and in preparation for launch
* Support strategic discussions on the future direction of the product and user experience
* Act as the product expert, customer advocate and liaison between your customers and Product Management & Design team to translate business requirements into product enhancements.
* Conduct project management
* Conduct regular status calls with customers to identify concerns and areas of opportunity and to provide updates on tracked issues and requests.
* Maintain issue, project, and enhancement priority and status lists for each customer on their account dashboard.
* Improve Customer Experience & Customer Satisfaction
* Lead strategic, cross-functional initiatives such as customer journeys, maturity models, voice-of-customer, and product feedback
* Provide feedback to CEO, CTO, Business Development and Marketing on patterns you see with Customers that will allow us to more efficiently scale our business

**Bonus if you have experience with:**

design
UX
managing remote teams
making data-informed decisions
startups
building cool things

**Requirements**
* Multiple years in a Product Manager with experience. Candidates looking to take a step up into Product Management in an early startup environment will be considered.
* Agile advocate, working in high-performing Agile teams.
* Ability to understand, simplify, and communicate technical and business process concepts to customers and colleagues
* Strong customer service skills
* Strong critical thinking skills
* Excellent verbal, written, and presentation skills
* Ability to take ownership of tasks
* Ability to work equally as well on a team or independently
* Self-motivated with a strong work ethic
* Comfortable in a fast-moving environment
* Ability to multitask and adapt
* Exceptional communication skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong verbal communication and interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company

**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

* You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
* We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
* This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
* You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
* You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
* After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

**You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.
**
Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**

  • You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
  • You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
  • After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

IMPORTANT NOTES:

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.

jobs.title: Senior Flutter Engineer
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Senior Flutter Engineer** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 SuperHeroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
 
* Design, develop, test, deploy, support and evolve software (native / hybrid applications, API’s)
* Manage individual priorities, deadlines and deliverables
* Collaborate with QA & solution team on continuous integration and delivery as well as automated and manual testing to ensure good quality solutions are delivered to provide value to our customers

* Focus on component reusability, data sharing and security while complying with Enterprise standards and processes
* Experiment with new tools and technologies ensuring our solutions stay relevant in a rapidly changing technology landscape while sharing gained knowledge across teams

* Multiple years of mobile programming in React Native, Flutter, hybrid apps and full-stack development
* Experience with Android SDK and iOS development
* DevOps CI/CD pipeline configuration including publishing applications to Google Play store, Apple app store or an enterprise app store
* RESTful APIs, Microservices, webservices, expert in SOA design and technical implementations
* A thorough understanding of Object Orientated Programming, MVC (and iOS application architecture for iOS mobile developer)
* Proven experience in PCF, Bluemix, TomCat, Liberty, Framework, Rest API, Java Hibernate, JPA, DevOps (Eclipse, Jenkins, Maven, UCD, Docker, MS visual studio), Junit
* Experience with test automation Junit, XCTest and XCUI, Selenium
* Hands on experience with relational databases (MS SQL Server) and exposure to no-SQL data stores: MongoDB, ElasticSearch as well as caching stores (Redis)
* Methodology: Agile, Iterative, TDD
* Demonstrated ability to make design/enhancement recommendations/decisions for multiple applications/technologies, mentor on standards and coding practices and debug very complex or urgent problems
* Ability to resolves integration issues to guarantee solution conformance to requirements and engineering limitations.
* Very strong organisational, planning and multi-tasking skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company

  • Ability to resolves integration issues to guarantee solution conformance to requirements and engineering limitations.
  • Very strong organisational, planning and multi-tasking skills
  • Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
  • Judgment and decision-making ability
  • Initiative
  • Professionalism and confidentiality
  • Attention to detail and accuracy
  • Flexibility
  • Strong interpersonal skills
  • Passion for Havn and the mission of the company

---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------

You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in St. Tropez from time to time.
After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.

IMPORTANT NOTES:

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.
**
Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.

jobs.title: Web / Wordpress Developer
jobs.description:
**RAISINI**, a 21 Year old global Creative, Entertainment & Marketing Agency and Dubai's 1st House Record Label and a Music Publishing Company, is launching a Lifestyle Membership SuperApp 'Havn' [Heaven] disrupting the Lifestyle industry, and make life a lot easier for individuals and the Hospitality industry, saving them TIME & MONEY while offering experiences that create unforgettable memories.

**Only the very best talent gets in to Havn!**

We are now looking for a proactive and ambitious **Web/Wordpress Developer** to join the team here at Havn.

The current team consist of over 25 Super Heroes from around the world (13 countries) and we are just getting started!

**What Does Success Look Like In This Role:**
 
* Establishing and guiding the website's architecture
* Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS
* Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working theme and/or plugin.
* Build websites, prototypes and applications using the latest front¬end and back-end technologies
* Providing timely resolution to reported problems with existing websites.
* Working closely with both the design and project resources to achieve the best possible results in web projects from conception right through to delivery.
* Ensuring all work adheres to current industry best practice.
* Self-motivated, goal oriented and able to work in a team environment.
* Use common sense at all times and pay close attention to detail.
* Client-facing demeanor for Training & Support.
* All visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering
* Conceptualize original website design ideas that bring simplicity and user friendliness to complex roadblocks
* Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to communicate interaction and design ideas
* Present and defend designs and key deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders
* Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards


**Requirements**
* Multiple years' experience of PHP programming, MySQL, HTML/CSS/LESS/SASS, JavaScript, XML/JSON and 3rd party APIs, Cross-platform and cross-browser, Responsive, Web standards and accessibility, Code testing, Security, Deployment
* Extensive knowledge and experience of building WordPress CMS websites using the best practice & de¬facto standard plugins
* Experience working with WordPress at a PHP code level:
* Knowledge of existing inbuilt WordPress functions.
* Customizing WordPress to support specific functionality
* Creation of plugins/widgets written to conform with WordPress coding standards.
* Knowledge of WordPress Network (Multisite) required.
* Experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications
* Experience designing and developing responsive design websites
* Comfortable working with debugging tools like Firebug, Chrome inspector, etc.
* Ability to convert comprehensive layout and wire-frames into working HTML pages
* Knowledge of different PHP frameworks, libraries, or any other technology relevant to WordPress Multisite
* Manage time effectively, ability to multi-task and meet deadlines
* Exceptional communication skills
* Problem analysis and problem-solving skills
* Judgment and decision-making ability
* Initiative
* Professionalism and confidentiality
* Attention to detail and accuracy
* Flexibility
* Strong verbal communication and interpersonal skills
* Passion for Havn and the mission of the company
* Personal Laptop/Computer
**---------------------------------------
Why Join RAISINI.Com
--------------------------------------**

* You will be part of a company that will disrupt an entire industry
* We provide a fun and entrepreneurial working environment within an exciting high-growth startup business, where you can use your talent to make a real difference.
* This is a rare opportunity to build a truly global product from the ground up, and join early a startup that will soon be a growing business of exceptional engineers working on the latest technologies.
* You will gain first-hand experience in building an AI-powered mobile application and delivering it to the end users.
* You will work side-by-side with the CEO/Founder who might take you out surfing or partying in Ibiza from time to time.
* After funding, we will be offering a very competitive remuneration package, flexible hours, generous holiday allowance, regular social events and many other perks we continue adding as the company grows.
****

**IMPORTANT NOTES:**

**This is an unpaid role until we are funded and launched this summer. You will be offered 'equity' shares & a bonus for time invested after our first funding round. We offer you shares to be a shareholder in the company to be extra motivated in the project and become a part of the family.

**You must understand and decide whether this would be the right set up for you.

**Havn receives 100s of CVs every day, so if you haven’t heard back from us within 28 days, sadly your application perhaps hasn’t been successful at this time. Keep an eye on future roles with Havn, as we are always looking to hire fresh talent as we continue to grow.**
